description:
It is every students desire to critical understand Mathematics terminologies. This course covers

  • Area model
  • Factorization -Using quadratic formula,factor approach and completing the square
  • Order of Operation-Using Bedmas. This course is intended for students in
  • Grade 7 and above
  • Parents who intend to help there kids with school work
  • Tutors who want a quick overview of these concept
  • Individuals who are rusty with their mathematics in the above topics.
  • Adult learners

WHAT AM I GOING TO GET

  • Over 8 lectures covered in 1hr 20mins(life time access)
  • A seasoned instructor who understands where the problem of comprehension lies
  • Ability to understand problems in this areas and approach them correctly
  • Equip yourself with the various tools to solve related problems
  • A breakdown of terminologies in the simplest form
  • Solving multiplication and division problems using Area models
  • Solving Quadratic equation using different formulas
  • Graded Practice problem to help you measure performance
  • My availability to help you through this course by answering questions as soon as possible.

REQUIREMENT

  • Pen and paper
  • Calculator
  • Learning enthusiasm and/or hatred for maths

Each lecture critically explains the concepts on a white board with the instructors voice in the background for direction. At the end of this course the last section provides problems covering all three topic. All student are suppose to attempt all problems and get a grade of 80% to be granted completion of course.

TAKE COURSE AND GET STARTED
title: Area Model,factorization &Order of Operation
